div.script: function CajReadXlst(filename, page, tmpYear) { var murl = 'http://mall.cnki.net/onlineview/MagaView.aspx?fn={0}*{1}*{2}'; if (page.indexOf("+") > 0) page = page.substr(0, page.indexOf("+")); OpenCnkiViewPage(String.Format(murl, filename, page, ""), tmpYear); } function GetFreeMagezine(uid, url, subuser) { if (uid == "") { alert("您还未登录,请先登录!"); } else if (subuser == 1) { alert("请您登录主账户领取该杂志!"); } else { window.location.href = url; } return false; } function showMagazineCatalog() { if (getArticleCatalogList != null) getArticleCatalogList('ZGSM', '2013', '17', -1, 'magazine', '中国商论', 'slidingList0'); } SetCurrentCheckBox('cb_selectall', 'cb_yearinfo', 'div_saveinfo', '2013');
